00018 #ifndef COBASE_PERTHREAD_H
00019 #define COBASE_PERTHREAD_H
00020 
00021 #include <errno.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00024 #include <co/base/os.h>
00025 #include <co/base/executionListener.h>
00026 #include <co/base/nonCopyable.h>
00027 
00028 namespace co
00029 {
00030 namespace base
00031 {
00032     class PerThreadPrivate;
00033 
00044     template<typename T> class PerThread : public ExecutionListener, 
00045                                            public NonCopyable
00046     {
00047     public:
00049         PerThread();
00051         ~PerThread();
00052 
00054         PerThread<T>& operator = ( const T* data );
00056         PerThread<T>& operator = ( const PerThread<T>& rhs );
00057 
00059         T* get();
00061         const T* get() const;
00063         T* operator->();
00065         const T* operator->() const;
00066 
00068         T& operator*()
00069             { EQASSERTINFO( get(), className( this )); return *get(); }
00071         const T& operator*() const
00072             { EQASSERTINFO( get(), className( this )); return *get(); }
00073 
00078         bool operator == ( const PerThread& rhs ) const 
00079             { return ( get() == rhs.get( )); }
00080 
00085         bool operator == ( const T* rhs ) const { return ( get()==rhs ); }
00086 
00091         bool operator != ( const T* rhs ) const { return ( get()!=rhs ); }
00092 
00097         bool operator ! () const;
00098 
00103         bool isValid() const;
00104 
00105     protected:
00106         virtual void notifyExecutionStopping();
00107 
00108     private:
00109         PerThreadPrivate* _data;
00110     };
00111 }
00112 }

00114 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // implementation
00116 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 
00118 // Crude test if pthread.h was included
00119 #ifdef PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER
00120 #  ifndef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00121 #    define HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00122 #  endif
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00126 
00127 #include <co/base/debug.h>
00128 #include <co/base/thread.h>
00129 
00130 namespace co
00131 {
00132 namespace base
00133 {
00134 
00135 class PerThreadPrivate
00136 {
00137 public:
00138     pthread_key_t key;
00139 };
00140 
00141 template< typename T >
00142 PerThread<T>::PerThread() 
00143         : _data( new PerThreadPrivate )
00144 {
00145     const int error = pthread_key_create( &_data->key, 0 );
00146     if( error )
00147     {
00148         EQERROR << "Can't create thread-specific key: " 
00149                 << strerror( error ) << std::endl;
00150         EQASSERT( !error );
00151     }
00152 
00153     Thread::addListener( this );
00154 }
00155 
00156 template< typename T >
00157 PerThread<T>::~PerThread()
00158 {
00159     Thread::removeListener( this );
00160 
00161     T* object = get();
00162     delete object;
00163 
00164     pthread_key_delete( _data->key );
00165     delete _data;
00166     _data = 0;
00167 }
00168 
00169 template< typename T >
00170 void PerThread<T>::notifyExecutionStopping()
00171 {
00172     T* object = get();
00173     pthread_setspecific( _data->key, 0 );
00174 
00175     delete object;
00176 }
00177 
00178 template< typename T >
00179 PerThread<T>& PerThread<T>::operator = ( const T* data )
00180 { 
00181     pthread_setspecific( _data->key, static_cast<const void*>( data ));
00182     return *this; 
00183 }
00184 
00185 template< typename T >
00186 PerThread<T>& PerThread<T>::operator = ( const PerThread<T>& rhs )
00187 { 
00188     pthread_setspecific( _data->key, pthread_getspecific( rhs._data->key ));
00189     return *this;
00190 }
00191 
00192 template< typename T >
00193 T* PerThread<T>::get()
00194 {
00195     return static_cast< T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00196 }
00197 template< typename T >
00198 const T* PerThread<T>::get() const
00199 {
00200     return static_cast< const T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00201 }
00202 
00203 template< typename T >
00204 T* PerThread<T>::operator->() 
00205 {
00206     return static_cast< T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00207 }
00208 template< typename T >
00209 const T* PerThread<T>::operator->() const 
00210 { 
00211     return static_cast< const T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00212 }
00213 
00214 template< typename T >
00215 bool PerThread<T>::operator ! () const
00216 {
00217     return pthread_getspecific( _data->key ) == 0;
00218 }
00219 
00220 template< typename T >
00221 bool PerThread<T>::isValid() const
00222 {
00223     return pthread_getspecific( _data->key ) != 0;
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 }
00228 }
00229 #endif // HAVE_PTHREAD_H

00231 #endif //COBASE_PERTHREAD_H
